search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Bonjoro (bonjoro.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Bonjoro is: [https://www.bonjoro.com/plans](https://www.bonjoro.com/plans)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Bonjoro Video Messaging - Plans and Pricing

extracted_content.content:
